inputs.selection_motivation: Bund 10y is the least critical link; US 5‑year influence on Bund 10y is weaker and less frequently cited than other yield, equity, or FX links, so removing it preserves core coverage while adding the new USDCNY link.

prioritized_link.motivation: US 5‑year Treasury yields are a primary benchmark for U.S. dollar strength; higher yields attract capital, strengthening the USD and directly pushing the USD/CNY rate higher.
